attributes.action: Be allowed to freely take your child on holiday in term time without penalties.
attributes.additional_details:
Children can learn and experience just as much if not more on a holiday with family than they do from a short period in a class room.
The cost to take a family away out of term time is so high (almost 3-4 times the amount) that it makes it a luxury most families can not afford.
This can also do a lot of good for the mental health of the children (and parents) as they experience new languages, cultures, food, socialising and an array of other experiences.
attributes.background: Abolish the fines and penalties including handing out criminal records for taking our own children out of school during term time.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Allow students to be taken out of school for two weeks a year without penalty
